text: The Heavyweight competition at the 2019 AIBA World Boxing Championships was held from 10 to 21 September 2019. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Tuesday 10 September 2019 || 17:15 (Ring A) 17:00 (Ring B) || First round |- | Sunday 15 September 2019 || 17:00 21:00 || Second round |- | Tuesday 17 September 2019 || 17:00 || Third round |- | Wednesday 18 September 2019 || 16:30 || Quarterfinals |- | Friday 20 September 2019 || 16:30 || Semifinals |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| Saturday 21 September 2019 || style=background:lemonchiffon| 20:15 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final |} All times are Yekaterinburg Time (UTC+5) ==Results== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== *Draw Heavyweight
title: 2019 AIBA World Boxing Championships – Heavyweight
